keanu_trivia: There is a conspiracy that believes that Keanu Reeves is immortal. Fans have noted that Keanu looks extremely similar to Paul Mounet, who was a French actor born in 1847, and they claim Keanu never seems to age.

open_ended: If the human egg is one cell, then is a chicken egg one giant egg cell?

keanu_trivia: In response to his sister’s battle with Leukemia, Reeves founded a privavous cancer charity which aids children’s hospitals and provides cancer research. He does not publicly attach his name to his donations.
